reqs:
Pre-reqs: POLI 101 and one of POLI 301, POLI 302, POLI 303, POLI 304, POLI 305, POLI 306, POLI 307, POLI 308.
This seminar will be held in Buch C403. This seminar will be jointly taught with POLI 504A. Registration by permission of the instructor.
courseName: Topics in Canadian Politics - TPC CANADA POLI
description: This seminar examines in depth some of the important issues in Canadian politics.
